content: If you delete this application, all active consents and authorization will be revoked. If a user tries to open the consent screen for this app, an error will occur in the document space and the user will be redirected to the specified redirect URL.

comment.text: This translation key is used to display a warning message when deleting an application, explaining that revoking active consents and authorization will occur, and a user will be redirected. It appears in a delete dialog component, prompting users to confirm deletion. Translators should focus on conveying this technical information in a clear and concise manner.

usage.context:
</ModalDialog.Header>
 <ModalDialog.Body>
 {isGroup ? (
 <Trans t={t} i18nKey="DeleteApplicationsDescription" ns="OAuth" />
 ) : (
 <Trans t={t} i18nKey="DeleteApplicationDescription" ns="OAuth" />
 )}
 </ModalDialog.Body>
 <ModalDialog.Footer>
 <Button
 className="delete-button"

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "مصادقة" (Muṣādaha) is a more formal translation of "authorization." A more natural and accessible term for a user facing application like this would be "تسجيل الدخول" (Tasjil al-dukhul) or "التحقق" (al-tahaqquq).
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: إذا قمت بحذف هذا التطبيق، فسيتم إلغاء جميع الأذونات النشطة وتسجيل الدخول.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word "مساحة الوثائق" (masāḥat al-wathā’iq) is very technical and might not be understood by the average user. It’s translating “document space” literally. A more understandable equivalent might be "النظام" or "البيئة".
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: إذا حاول المستخدم فتح شاشة الأذونات لهذا التطبيق، فسيحدث خطأ في النظام.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word "səlahiyyətlər" (authorities/powers) isn't the best translation for "authorization" in this context. It implies a broader scope than just the authorization granted to an application.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider using "rüknümuəyyənə" (authorization) or a phrase that conveys the concept of application-specific permissions.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "göstərilən yönləndirmə URL-inə" is a bit clunky. While grammatically correct, it could be more fluent.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider phrasing it as "müəyyən edilmiş yönləndirmə URL-inə" or simply "yönləndirmə URL-inə" if the context makes it clear it's a designated URL.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'document space' is not a standard translation for what is intended here. It's not clear what 'document space' refers to in this context. A more accurate translation would convey the location or storage where authorization information resides.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider replacing 'v prostoru pro dokumenty' with something like 'v systému autorizace' or 'v aplikačním prostředí'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The repetition of 'uživatel' (user) makes the sentence slightly clunky. While grammatically correct, it could be smoother.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider rephrasing to avoid repetition. For example: 'Pokud se uživatel pokusí otevřít obrazovku souhlasu pro tuto aplikaci, dojde k chybě a bude přesměrován na zadanou adresu URL přesměrování.'

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "authorization" is translated as "εξουσιοδότηση". While technically correct, a more natural and commonly used translation in this context would be "εξουσιοδότηση" or "άδεια".
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Εάν διαγράψετε αυτήν την εφαρμογή, όλες οι ενεργές συναινέσεις και η εξουσιοδότηση/άδεια θα ανακληθούν.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'document space' is translated as 'χώρο εγγράφων'. It is better to use a more common term for this context, like 'περιοχή' or 'χώρος'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Εάν ένας χρήστης προσπαθήσει να ανοίξει την οθόνη συγκατάθεσης για αυτήν την εφαρμογή, θα εμφανιστεί σφάλμα στην περιοχή/χώρο και ο χρήστης θα ανακατευθυνθεί στην καθορισμένη διεύθυνση URL ανακατεύθυνσης.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'redirect URL' is translated as 'διεύθυνση URL ανακατεύθυνσης'. While accurate, a more concise and natural way to express it would be 'διεύθυνση ανακατεύθυνσης'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Εάν ένας χρήστης προσπαθήσει να ανοίξει την οθόνη συγκατάθεσης για αυτήν την εφαρμογή, θα εμφανιστεί σφάλμα στην περιοχή/χώρο και ο χρήστης θα ανακατευθυνθεί στην καθορισμένη διεύθυνση ανακατεύθυνσης.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: “Sisällöt” is an odd translation for “consents”. "Suostumukset" would be a more accurate and common translation for consents in this context.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Jos poistat tämän sovelluksen, kaikki aktiiviset suostumukset ja valtuutukset peruutetaan.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: “Asiakirjatilassa” is not an accurate translation of “document space”.  It's too literal and doesn't convey the intended meaning.  A better phrasing would be 'virhe ilmenee' (an error occurs).
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Jos käyttäjä yrittää avata tämän sovelluksen suostumusnäyttöä, virhe ilmenee ja käyttäjä ohjataan...

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "consent screen" is not accurately translated. "Համաձայնության ձևը" (consent form) doesn't quite capture the meaning of 'consent screen' in this context. A more accurate translation would involve using a term that implies a screen or interface.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider translating "consent screen" as "համաձայնության էկրան" (consent screen) or something similar that more accurately reflects a user interface element.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The sentence structure could be improved for better readability in Armenian. The repeated 'Եթե' (If) feels clunky.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Rephrase the first sentence to avoid repetition. For example: 'Ջնջելու դեպքում այս հավելվածը, բոլոր ակտիվ համաձայնությունները և թույլտվությունները կչեղարկվեն:' (Deleting this application will revoke all active consents and authorizations:).

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'Se si elimina l'applicazione' is grammatically awkward. Using 'Se si elimina l'applicazione' implies the application is eliminating itself.  A more natural phrasing would use a subject.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Se *viene* eliminata l'applicazione

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While technically correct, the passive voice 'verrà reindirizzato' can sound a bit formal and indirect in Italian. Using an active voice would improve readability.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: reindirizzerà l'utente all'URL di reindirizzamento specificato

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "authorization" is not naturally translated as "承認 (shōnin)" in this context. A more appropriate translation would be "認証 (shōnin)" or "許可 (kyoka)".  '承認' implies approval or acceptance, whereas 'authentication' or 'permission' is more accurate for the technical meaning of authorization.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: このアプリケーションを削除すると、すべてのアクティブな同意および認証が取り消されます。

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "active consents" is not accurately translated. While "유효한 동의" (yu-hwal-han dong-i) translates to "valid consents," it doesn't convey the sense of 'active' or currently granted consents. It could imply any consent, not just those currently in effect.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 이 애플리케이션을 삭제하면 현재 유효한 모든 동의 및 인증이 철회됩니다.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While not strictly incorrect, the Korean translation could benefit from a slightly more natural flow. Combining sentences could improve readability.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 이 애플리케이션을 삭제하면 현재 유효한 모든 동의 및 인증이 철회되며, 사용자가 이 앱에 대한 동의 화면을 열려고 시도할 경우 문서 공간에서 오류가 발생하고 사용자는 지정된 리디렉션 URL로 리디렉션됩니다.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Lao translation uses a somewhat verbose phrasing. While technically correct, it could be more concise and user-friendly. Specifically, "ການຕົກລົງຮັບອະນຸຍາດ ແລະ ການອະນຸຍາດທັງໝົດທີ່ກຳລັງເຮັດຢູ່ຈະຖືກຍົກເລີກ" can be simplified.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ຖ້າທ່ານລົບແອັບພລິເຄຊັນນີ້, ການອະນຸຍາດທັງໝົດຈະຖືກຍົກເລີກ

ai_spell_check_issues.description: “document space” translates somewhat awkwardly. The concept may need explanation or a more fitting term.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider translating to something like “ລະບົບ” or a similar term relevant to the system's architecture that conveys the intended context better.  The best option depends on the technical audience.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'vietrādi' is a misspelling of 'pārvirzīšanas'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Ja lietotājs mēģinās atvērt šīs lietotnes piekrišanas ekrānu, dokumentu telpā radīsies kļūda un lietotājs tiks novirzīts uz norādīto pārvirzīšanas URL.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "obszarze roboczym dokumentu" (document workspace) is not the most natural or accurate translation of "document space" in this context. It sounds overly technical and might confuse users.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider a more user-friendly translation like "przestrzeni dokumentów" or "systemie" (system). For example, 'Jeżeli użytkownik spróbuje otworzyć ekran zgody dla tej aplikacji, w systemie wystąpi błąd...'

ai_spell_check_issues.description: There's a slight inconsistency in the punctuation. The first sentence ends with a period, but the second sentence starts with 'Jeżeli' (If) without a capital letter following the period. While common in informal writing, a capital letter is generally preferred for a more formal and consistent tone.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Change 'Jeżeli' to 'Jeżeli' after the period.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "document space" doesn't have a direct equivalent in Portuguese that maintains the technical meaning. "Espaço do documento" is a literal translation, but it may not be clear to a Portuguese speaker. It would be better to rephrase to maintain clarity.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider alternatives like "ambiente de documento" or rephrasing the sentence to avoid the need for a direct translation (e.g., 'ocorrerá um erro no sistema e o utilizador será redirecionado...').

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The sentence includes punctuation marks (e.g., commas, periods) that are accurate in English but might benefit from review to ensure they flow naturally in Portuguese. While not strictly incorrect, slight adjustments may enhance readability.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Review comma usage and sentence flow for a more natural Portuguese feel.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "va apărea o eroare" is a bit clunky. While technically correct, it could be improved for flow.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: va apărea o eroare

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "application" is translated as "යෙදුම" which is technically correct but might be better represented as "අප්ලිකේෂන්" or a combination of both depending on the target audience's familiarity with English terminology. "යෙදුම" is a general term for application and lacks the specific connotation of an OAuth application.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider using "අප්ලිකේෂන්" or "යෙදුම් අප්ලිකේෂන්" for better clarity, especially if the target audience is familiar with the English term. A note to the translator could specify the appropriate term based on context.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "revoked" is translated as "අහෝසි කරනු ලැබේ" which implies cancellation or nullification. While close, "ඉක්මතු කරනු ලැබේ" or "ඉවත් කරනු ලැබේ" might be more precise in the context of authorization being revoked.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider using "ඉක්මතු කරනු ලැබේ" or "ඉවත් කරනු ලැබේ" instead of "අහෝසි කරනු ලැබේ" to more accurately convey the meaning of revocation.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation of "error" as "දෝෂයක්" is technically correct, but in a technical context it might be better represented with a more specific term, possibly a term used in error logs.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider a more precise term for 'error' that is commonly used in technical documentation, or a general term that conveys the severity of an error. The ideal solution would depend on the target audience.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The sentences are a bit long and could be broken down for better readability in Sinhala.  While grammatically correct, a more conversational tone might improve comprehension.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider breaking down the long sentences into shorter, more manageable units. For example, split the first sentence into two.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "URL adresu zadanú na presmerovanie" is not the most natural way to express "redirect URL". It's overly literal and clunky. A more natural phrasing would be "presmerovacia URL adresa" or simply "URL adresa na presmerovanie".
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Ak túto aplikáciu vymažete, všetky aktívne súhlasy a oprávnenia budú zrušené. Ak sa používateľ pokúsi otvoriť obrazovku súhlasu pre túto aplikáciu, v priestore pre dokumenty sa objaví hlásenie o chybe a používateľ bude presmerovaný na presmerovaciu URL adresu.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'podani' is used instead of 'določeni' or 'navedeni' when referring to the redirect URL. 'Podani' implies a given or submitted URL, which isn't the intended meaning.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Če uporabnik poskuša odpreti zaslon za soglasje za to aplikacijo, se bo v prostoru dokumenta pojavila napaka in uporabnik bo preusmerjen na določeni/navedeni preusmeritveni URL.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'authorization' is not accurately translated. 'Autorizacija' is a direct loanword from English and might not be the most natural Serbian term in this context. A better option would be 'овлашћења'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Replace 'ауторизација' with 'овлашћења'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'document space' is not naturally translated. 'Простор за документе' is literal and can sound awkward. It would be more idiomatic to use a phrase like 'документациони простор' or rephrase the sentence to avoid the need for a direct translation.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider replacing 'простору за документе' with 'документационом простору' or restructuring the sentence to avoid a direct translation, e.g., 'доћи ће до грешке при раду са документима'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation uses a full stop at the end of the first sentence. Maintaining consistency with the English source, which uses a comma, would improve readability. Although grammatically correct, the full stop feels abrupt.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Replace the full stop after 'опозвани' with a comma.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "URL za preusmeravanje" is technically correct but a more natural and commonly used term would be "URL za preusmerenje".
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: URL za preusmerenje

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'authorization' is best translated as 'yetkilendirme' in this context, not just 'yetkilendirme'. While 'yetkilendirme' is acceptable, 'yetkilendirme' is more precise and commonly used in technical documentation.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Bu uygulamayı silerseniz, tüm etkin izinler ve yetkilendirmeler iptal edilir. Bir kullanıcı bu uygulama için izin ekranını açmaya çalışırsa, belge alanında bir hata oluşur ve kullanıcı belirtilen yönlendirme URL’sine yönlendirilir.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The term "document space" is translated literally as "просторі документів", which doesn't accurately convey the meaning in this context. It sounds awkward and unclear.  It likely refers to the application's area or data storage.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: If referring to the application's data store, consider 'просторі даних застосунку' or 'області застосунку'. If referring to a broader system context, 'системі' or 'застосунку' might be more appropriate.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The use of 'URL-адресу' is technically correct but slightly verbose.  A more natural Ukrainian usage would be simpler.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Replace 'URL-адресу' with just 'адресу'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "đồng ý cho màn hình" is awkward and doesn't accurately convey "consent screen." It's literally "consent for screen".
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Nếu người dùng cố gắng mở màn hình đồng ý cho ứng dụng này

ai_spell_check_issues.description: “không gian tài liệu” translates to “document space”, but in this context a more natural Vietnamese phrasing would be preferable. It sounds overly technical.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Nếu người dùng cố gắng mở màn hình đồng ý cho ứng dụng này, một lỗi sẽ xảy ra

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The sentence structure is a bit long and could benefit from being broken down for better readability. Combining the two sentences avoids overly technical wording.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Nếu bạn xóa ứng dụng này, tất cả sự đồng ý và ủy quyền đang có hiệu lực sẽ bị thu hồi. Nếu người dùng cố gắng mở màn hình đồng ý cho ứng dụng này, một lỗi sẽ xảy ra.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "consent screen" is translated as "同意界面". While technically correct, "授权界面" or simply "同意页面" would be more natural and commonly used in this context in Chinese, particularly when dealing with OAuth.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 将 "同意界面" 替换为 "授权界面" 或 "同意页面".
